original_text: For he rebuilt the high places that his father Hezekiah had broken down, and he erected altars to the Baals, and made Asheroth, and worshiped all the host of heaven and served them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당을 다시 세우며 바알들을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 모든 일월성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: For he rebuilt the high places
that his father Hezekiah had broken down
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 아버지 히스기야가 헐었던 것들이었다

sentences.original_text: and he erected altars to the Baals
and worshiped all the host of heaven
